metadata.title: CVE-2024-24859 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth insniff_{min,max}_interval_set() function. This can result in a bluetoothsniffing exception issue, possibly leading denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
